channel.title: Will's Weekly Reads
channel.description: A selection of my top weekly reads
channel.author: William Gambacrdella

item.title: How Stripe Built a Writing Culture
item.description: Stripe’s Documentation Manager shares how the company built a culture where writing is second nature.
item.author: RC Victorino

item.title: How HashiCorp Makes Writing a Priority
item.description: Kevin Fishner, Chief of Staff at HashiCorp, discusses how companies can build a culture of writing and documentation.
item.author: Rebecca Acree

item.title: Uber’s 3-Step Approach to Getting More Engineers to Document
item.description: Stephanie Blotner, Technical Writer, shares how Uber motivates engineers to invest in documentation.
item.author: Rebecca Acree

item.title: Monitoring your EventStoreDB with Prometheus and Grafana
item.description: I would like to introduce you to some concepts related to system monitoring and demonstrate how you can gather and analyze metrics from your installation of EventStoreDB using Prometheus and Grafana.
item.author: Marcin Budny

item.title: LINUX FU: DATABASES ARE NEXT-LEVEL FILE SYSTEMS
item.author: Al Williams
